TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PageOrientation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定如何在打印介质上确定内容页的方向。

span.span: Specifies how pages of content are oriented on print media.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要用于以下目的使用此类型的值：Use the values of this type primarily for these purposes: - 作为的成员集合，这是一个属性的，这些值指示打印机支持的方向类型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the orientation types that a printer supports. - 值作为属性，此值指示要使用特定的方向的打印机。As the value of the property of a , the value directs the printer to use a particular orientation. **未知**属性中永远不会使用值对象。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 你决不能设置属性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*方向功能设置为无法识别的选项 (即，一个选项，中未定义[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397))，则构造与该文档的应用程序中的对象将具有**未知**的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the orientation feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管和类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)能够识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此枚举来设置值。The following example shows how to use this enumeration to set values. [!code-csharp[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/CSharp/XpsPrintHelper.cs#outputcolorandpageorientation)] [!code-vb[XpsPrint#OutputColorAndPageOrientation](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsPrint/visualbasic/xpsprinthelper.vb#outputcolorandpageorientation)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Landscape = int32(1)

summary.span: 将成像区域的内容从标准（纵向）方向逆时针方向旋转 90 。

span.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees counterclockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Portrait = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation ReverseLandscape = int32(3)

summary.span: 将成像区域的内容从标准（纵向）方向顺时针方向旋转 90 。

span.span: Content of the imageable area is rotated on the page 90 degrees clockwise from standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation ReversePortrait = int32(4)

summary.span: 将成像区域的内容倒置（相对于标准（纵向）方向）。

span.span: Content of the imageable area is upside down relative to standard (portrait) orientation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PageOrientation Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
